A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While rather good in general\, a lot of pointless small characters take away our attention of the big story\, sometimes killing the mood. The Force is treated as something it's not originally. Great acting mostly but too many bugs in the science and the action scenes. The CGI is breathtaking but was expected to be. To sum up: this movie didn't bring anything new and both the big bad guy and the big nice guy died... in an none epic way... which was lame to say the least...
